schema.description: Represents an event in the REX system.

description.description: Event description, displayed in the booklet
description.title: Description

dorm.description: Dorms hosting the event. While typically a single dorm, this can also be multiple dorms.
dorm.title: Dorm

id.description: 4-Digit Event Code, used for linking, bookmarking, and making event revisions.
id.title: Id

tags.description: Tags associated with the event, used for filtering and display
tags.title: Tags

schema.title: Event
